name: 黃希敏
objective: 引導學生瞭解如何根據不同對象、不同場合、不同時間、不同情境，正確地理解英語以及貼切地使用英語，也概括介紹分析語言溝通所需的概念與工具。
schedule:
1.　　Intro. (Speech on “Lexical Pragmatics”)
2.　　What is Pragmatics?
3.　　Entailment
4.　　Presupposition’
5.　　The co-operative principle and implicature
6.　　More on implicatures
7.　　Speech acts & More on Speech acts A
8.　　More on Speech acts B & Politeness
9.　　MIDTERM
10.　　What is Lexical Pragmatics? (SOS I)
11.　　Issues in Meaning Construction (SOS II) A
12.　　Issues in Meaning Construction (SOS II) B
13.　　Pragmatic Issues in L2 Instruction (SOS III) A
14.　　Pragmatic Issues in L2 Instruction (SOS III) B
15.　　Rhetorical Devices as Pragmatic Strategies in EFL (SOS V) A
16.　　Rhetorical Devices as Pragmatic Strategies in EFL (SOS V) B
17.　　Review
18.　　FINAL
materials:
Textbooks:
1.　　Pecci, Jean Stilwell (1999). Pragmatics (Rouledge)
2.　　Hwang, Caroline C. (2009). SOS : A Model of Lexical Pragmatics for Chinese-Speaking Learners (Pearson-Longman)
